body_html:
I managed to figure out my environment and fixed (almost) all of the tests.

One of the tests fails; when the params fed to the constructor is None. I can't figure out why these tests work for the other optimizers.

body:
I managed to figure out my environment and fixed (almost) all of the tests.

One of the tests fails; when the params fed to the constructor is `None`. I can't figure out why these tests work for the other optimizers.
